page.title: 03Abbotsley Oldest Inhabitant
page.content: We went to interview Mrs Flint who was a nurse during the first world war.She is still very interested in farming. She's lived in Abbotsley for 85 years so when she came to Abbotsley it was 1900 and she was a little girl.She later married a local farmer. She goes to St.Neots once a week with an old lady who lives next door.Her son takes them.Mrs Flint has no children or granchildren.She likes old and slow songs. She is the oldest lady in Abotsley.If she had to have two pets she would have a dog and a horse.Mrs Flint is a bit deaf but she seems like a young lady because of the way she talks. She loves talking. Mrs Flint lives in one of the bungalows built for the older inhabitants.
